<SecurityCritical>
Public NotOverridable Overrides Function InitializeLifetimeService() As Object

return.description: An object of type used to control the lifetime policy for this instance. This is the current lifetime service object for this instance if one exists; otherwise, a new lifetime service object initialized to the value of the property.

exceptions.description: The immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission.

return.description: An object which, when disposed, un-subscribes.

children.summary: Subscribes to the appropriate assembly resolution event, to provide automatic assembly resolution for an assembly and any of its dependencies. Depending on the target platform, this may include the use of the .deps.json file generated during the build process.
